feed.title: Poly Middle School Math Team
feed.subtitle: "Poly's middle school team competes in local and national math contests, including MATHCOUNTS, AMC 8, Math League, Vanguard Math Tournament, Purple Comet!, and more. We welcome all interested middle school students, regardless of background or experience."

entry.title: American Institute of Mathematics Fair
entry.content: Poly students attended a celebratory math fair at Caltech hosted by the American Institute of Mathematics. Activities included UltraSET, combinatorial games, logic puzzles, and more.
entry.summary: Poly students attended a math fair at Caltech hosted by the American Institute of Mathematics.

entry.title: Vanguard Math Tournament
entry.content: Over a dozen Poly students competed at the Vanguard Math Tournament in La Canada. Two sixth-graders placed top 10, receiving honorable mentions.
entry.summary: Over a dozen Poly students competed at the Vanguard Math Tournament in La Canada.

entry.title: 2024 MATHCOUNTS Chapter Competition
entry.content: Competing for the first time since before the pandemic, Poly placed 6th at the East San Gabriel Valley MATHCOUNTS Chapter Competition in Irwindale, with two students individually placing in the top 25. See the PolyNews press release here.
entry.summary: Poly placed 6th at the East San Gabriel Valley MATHCOUNTS Chapter Competition in Irwindale.

entry.title: 2024 AMC 8
entry.content: 17 students took the nationwide AMC 8 exam for the first time, and Poly scored well above the national average. Three sixth-graders landed on the Achievement Roll.
entry.summary: 17 students took the nationwide AMC 8 exam for the first time, and Poly scored well above the national average.
